title: Social Studies Approach for Creative Block Overcoming and Design Thinking Expansion

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of Fundamental Design Principles and Experience in Managing Elementary Education Curricula
context.additional_context: Social Skill-Enhanced Creative Problem-Solving Education in a Smartphone-Based LMS Environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causes of creative blocks and suggest three or more strategies to overcome them.
Learners can produce one social studies lesson material applying the concept of "spatial freedom" to curriculum design.
Learners can explain methods to structure creative thinking processes through peer feedback.

resources: Case Analysis Video (5 Minutes or Less)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
